\pagestyle{empty}
\begin{document}
\thispagestyle{empty}

% A4 canvas: 210mm x 297mm
\begin{tikzpicture}[remember picture,overlay]
  % --- Top image block (about 60% of page) ---
  % You can adjust the height later during calibration.
  \def\ImgTopY{297mm}
  \def\ImgHeight{175mm}
  \def\ImgBottomY{\dimexpr\ImgTopY-\ImgHeight\relax}

  % Place cover image full width, anchored at top.
  % (No cropping is handled BEFORE LaTeX by your image-fit logic or by providing A4-ratio artwork.)
  \node[anchor=north west,inner sep=0pt] at (0mm,\ImgTopY)
    {\includegraphics[width=210mm,height=\ImgHeight,keepaspectratio]{\CoverImagePath}};

  % --- Bottom text block: centered stack (the important 40%) ---
  % These Y positions are starting points. We’ll fine-tune after first successful render.
  \def\CenterX{105mm}

  % Main Title
  \node[anchor=north] at (\CenterX,\dimexpr\ImgBottomY-8mm\relax) {%
    {\merri\bfseries\fontsize{34pt}{38pt}\selectfont \MainTitle}%
  };

  % Subheadline line 1 (italic)
  \node[anchor=north] at (\CenterX,\dimexpr\ImgBottomY-25mm\relax) {%
    {\merri\bfseries\itshape\fontsize{30pt}{34pt}\selectfont \SubOne}%
  };

  % Subheadline line 2 (italic)
  \node[anchor=north] at (\CenterX,\dimexpr\ImgBottomY-40mm\relax) {%
    {\merri\bfseries\itshape\fontsize{30pt}{34pt}\selectfont \SubTwo}%
  };

  % Headline (Construction Finance)
  \node[anchor=north] at (\CenterX,\dimexpr\ImgBottomY-58mm\relax) {%
    {\merri\bfseries\fontsize{20pt}{24pt}\selectfont \Headline}%
  };

  % Project name
  \node[anchor=north] at (\CenterX,\dimexpr\ImgBottomY-78mm\relax) {%
    {\setmainfont{Raleway}\bfseries\fontsize{16pt}{20pt}\selectfont \ProjectName}%
  };

  % Loan amount (light grey)
  \node[anchor=north] at (\CenterX,\dimexpr\ImgBottomY-100mm\relax) {%
    {\setmainfont{Raleway}\fontsize{20pt}{24pt}\selectfont \textcolor{gray!55}{\LoanAmount}}%
  };

  % Date line (you wanted this added; styled subtly)
  \node[anchor=north] at (\CenterX,\dimexpr\ImgBottomY-114mm\relax) {%
    {\setmainfont{Raleway}\fontsize{10.5pt}{13pt}\selectfont \textcolor{gray!70}{\DateLine}}%
  };

  % Reference number line
  \node[anchor=north] at (\CenterX,\dimexpr\ImgBottomY-126mm\relax) {%
    {\setmainfont{Raleway}\fontsize{10.5pt}{13pt}\selectfont \textcolor{gray!70}{Our Reference Number: \RefNumber}}%
  };

  % Company line (very small, bottom)
  \node[anchor=south] at (\CenterX,6mm) {%
    \begin{minipage}{190mm}
      \centering
      {\setmainfont{Raleway}\fontsize{8pt}{10pt}\selectfont \textcolor{gray!60}{\CompanyLine}}
    \end{minipage}
  };

\end{tikzpicture}
